description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Fix the issue of crashing due to button style when entering management from the left menu  
2. Fix the issue where 26.1-snapshot was incorrectly categorized  
3. Fix related issues caused by using key hold functionality  
4. Fix the NullPointerException when a suitable Java version cannot be found  
5. Hide the search box on the NeoForge/Optifine download interface  
6. Fix issues related to the layout edit/create dialog  
7. Fix the issue where Java cannot be deleted in the Java management dialog  
8. Add version 1.21.11 filtering on the download page

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.修复从左侧菜单进入管理按键样式闪退的问题
2.修复26.1-snapshot被错误分类的问题
3.修复使用按键保持后产生的相关问题
4.修复找不到合适的Java版本时报空指针的问题
5.在NeoForge/Optifine下载界面隐藏搜索框
6.修复布局编辑/创建对话框相关问题
7.修复java管理对话框无法删除java的问题
8.在下载页面增加1.21.11版本过滤
